page.title: 13AGRICULTURE
page.content: The majority of the landuse is devoted to the production of {arable}crops. Oilseed rape, winter sown wheat and barley, potatoes and tic beans are all grown on the excellent {limestone} soil. {Yields}are high with rape producing two tons to the acre and wheat two and a half tons to the acre. During the month of May the area looks very colourful with the saffron flowers of the rape being visible from a long way off. Farming Units are large and privately owned. All use the latest machinery. Recently some{ {aerial}spraying of weedkiller on a field of beans adjacent to our school field overlapped and caused our headmaster to complain to the Local Authority.
